editimage: Label for Special:EditImage, where the user may edit an image via a service.
editimage-sourcefile-label: Label for the field indicating what file the user wishes to edit
editimage-destfile-label: Label for the field indicating where the user wants the edited file to be saved
editimage-comment-label: Label for the field holding the comment to be used during the edit-and-upload operation
editimage-text-label: Label for the textarea holdig the description text for the edited file
